reporting-org.narrative: AICS - Italian Agency for Cooperation and Development

title.narrative: UNFPA Multicountry Response to Gender-Based Violence and Reproductive Health Needs of Women and Girls Affected by the Syria Crisis in Egypt, Lebanon a

description.narrative: Progetto multibilaterale regionale di sostegno ai servizi di salute sessuale e riproduttiva delle rifugiate siriane e di contrasto alla violenza di genere che verrà gestito dall’United Nation Population Fund (UNFPA) e verrà amministrato dal UNFPA Syrian Regional Response Hub, basato ad Amman.

The projectwill support Syrian refugees access to sexual and reproductive health and gender-based violence services. It will be managed by the United Nations Population Fund (UNFPA) and administered by the UNFPA Syrian Regional Response Hub, based in Amman.

tag.narrative: Achieve gender equality and empower all women and girls
